author: Prof Luke Clancy
title: Now is the time to give up smoking and vaping
description: Covid-19 is changing our lives, maybe for ever, and remarkable efforts are being made to save people’s lives. Action on smoking and vaping cessation must become part of these efforts because, already, data clearly show the influence of smoking on the disease …
